biotools.summary: PhyloMagnet provides fast and accurate screening of short-read meta-omics data using gene-centric phylogenetics. The tool has a pipeline for screening metagenomes, looking for arbitrary lineages, using gene-centric assembly methods and phylogenetics

bioschemas.name: PhyloMagnet
bioschemas.summary: PhyloMagnet provides fast and accurate screening of short-read meta-omics data using gene-centric phylogenetics. The tool has a pipeline for screening metagenomes, looking for arbitrary lineages, using gene-centric assembly methods and phylogenetics
